short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts the positioning of pencilmarks. Intended to be used for regular sudoku and fourteen by lepton.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes corner functionality to properly act as pencil marks. Disables several other features not needed for regular sudoku or fourteen by lepton.
